newsitem.title: USA: Lazare Kaplan to offer 2.2 mln shares.
newsitem.headline: Lazare Kaplan to offer 2.2 mln shares.

text.p: Lazare Kaplan International Inc said Wednesday it has filed to offer 2.2 million shares of its common stock, 400,000 shares of which are to be offered by Chairman Maurice Tempelsman.

The company said it plans to use the proceeds to repay all or a portion of its senior notes and revolving loan facility. It plans to use the increased financing capacity to expand its business and for general working capital purposes, it said.
Lazare Kaplan said it expects the proposed offering will begin by early to mid-December.
Lazare Kaplan sells diamonds and jewelry products.
